text: (napiyē!) Maraṇa payattāl tam vīṭukaḷaiviṭṭum, āyirakkaṇakkil veḷiyēṟiyavarkaḷai nīr kavaṉikkavillaiyā? Allāh avarkaḷiṭam"iṟantu viṭuṅkaḷ" eṉṟu kūṟiṉāṉ; mīṇṭum avarkaḷai uyirppittāṉ;. Niccayamāka allāh maṉitarkaḷ mītu perum karuṇaiyuṭaiyavaṉ; āṉāl maṉitarkaḷil perumpālōr naṉṟi celuttuvatillai
